# CrowdStrikeHosts

The CrowdStrikeHosts table contains logs from the CrowdStrike Hosts API that have been ingested into Microsoft Sentinel.


## Table attributes

|Attribute|Value|
|---|---|
|**Resource types**|-|
|**Categories**|Security|
|**Solutions**| SecurityInsights|
|**Basic log**|Yes|
|**Ingestion-time transformation**|Yes|
|**Sample Queries**|-|
